choices.D: It cannot have access to more than one VDOM.
choices.A: It can upgrade the firmware on the FortiGate device.
choices.B: It can reset the password for the admin account.
choices.C: It can create administrator accounts with access to the same VDOM.

questions.question_text:
A FortiGate device has multiple VDOMs.
Which statement about an administrator account configured with the default prof_admin profile is true?
During the digital verification process, comparing the original and fresh hash results satisfies which security requirement?

discussion.content:
C is the correct answer because the question is:
"During the digital verification process, comparing the original and fresh hash......."

At FortiGate_Infrastructure_6.2_Study_Guide-Online page 318, i read:
"In the third, and final, part of the verification process, FotiGate compare s the fresh hash to the original hash result... If the two hash results are different, then the version of the certificate that FortiGate has is not the same as the one that the CA signed, and data integrity fails."

choices.E: All interfaces on the transparent mode FortiGate device must be on different IP subnets.
choices.B: FortiGate acts as a transparent bridge and forwards traffic at Layer 2.
choices.C: Ethernet packets are forwarded based on destination MAC addresses, not IP addresses.
choices.D: It permits inline traffic inspection and firewalling without changing the IP scheme of the network.
choices.A: The transparent FortiGate is visible to network hosts in an IP traceroute.

questions.question_text: Which three statements correctly describe transparent mode operation? (Choose three.)

comments.content: Yes, p.395 of Fortigate Infrastructure 6.2 Guide.

discussion.content: C & D are correct. You cannot change the configuration in conserve mode, also Fortigate stops doing inspection to saves its memory and CPU states.

choices.C: FortiGate stops sending files to FortiSandbox for inspection.
choices.B: FortiGate stops doing RPF checks over incoming packets.
choices.A: Administrators can access the FortiGate only through the console port.

questions.question_text: Which two statements about conserve mode are true? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: C & D are correct - FGT_Security, p. 374

questions.question_text: Which two features are supported by web filter in flow-based inspection mode with NGFW mode set to profile-based? (Choose two.)
